name: E. Swap and Take
statement:
You’re given an array consisting of n integers. You have to perform n
turns.Initially your score is 0.On the i-th turn, you are allowed to
leave the array as it is or swap any one pair of 2 adjacent elements in
the array and change exactly one of them to 0(and leave the value of
other element unchanged) after swapping. In either case(whether you swap
or not), after this you add a_i to your score. What’s the maximum
possible score you can get?
